availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Buckman (Union County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of William D. Buckman and Ann Merriman Buckman. Married to Mary H. Clark Buckman in Union County on January 4, 1860. Father of Mary A. Buckman and Laura Buckman. Farmer in Union County in 1850. Deputy Sheriff and Sheriff in Union County from 1859 to 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 521.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, District 2, p. 506B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, Morganfield, p. 350B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 00056172.
Memoirs of the Lower Ohio: Personal and Genealogical, with Portraits, vol. I, (Madison, WI: Federal Publishing Company, 1905), pp. 134-135.
"John Merriman Buckman (1830-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial 13757702, accessed December 15, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13757702.
